properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , EMAIL , ADDRESS , MEM_WARNING , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_LEVEL , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , EMAIL , ADDRESS ) VALUES ( 'M' || SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
